fullText: Hell's Kitchen succeeds as both a jukebox musical and a coming-of-age story, thanks to Alicia Keys' infectious catalog and a powerhouse performance from Maleah Joi Moon.
dtliExcerpt: Hell's Kitchen succeeds as both a jukebox musical and a coming-of-age story, thanks to Alicia Keys' infectious catalog and a powerhouse performance from Maleah Joi Moon.
